    Disclaimer

    This report is based on research performed at the initiative of the Pax Syriana Foundation, a non-profit organisation. The researchers and other contributors of this report were all working as volunteers, and they were recruited through the crowd-based non-profit organization crowdfight. The crowdfight organisation had no further role in this report, or in the opinions and recommendations raised in the document and has kindly agreed to host the code and website in their repository.
